name: Mipony Remote Lite
description: Official application to control Mipony from your Android. - Manage downloads (Start, stop, cancel) - Enter captchas (Trial limited) - Add downloads (Trial limited) - Clean completed downloads  Lite version includes ads and it does not include: - Unlimited captchas - Unlimited add files - Show an android notification when it is required to enter a captcha - Download the files to the mobile phone  Requires Mipony 1.5.0 or higher on the host machine.  If you dont know about Mipony. It is a download manager similar to JDownloader but more user friendly and it uses less resources. You can get more information here http://www.mipony.net
